availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Cabel Harrison Fenwick (Anderson County, Kentucky, attorney and court clerk)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, attorney and court clerk. Frankfort, Kentucky native. Married to Ann Malone Fenwick in Anderson County on April 19, 1842. Married to Laura Phelps Fenwick in Anderson County on November 10, 1856. Father of Mary Lee Fenwick. Resident of Frankfort in 1830. Clerk of Anderson Circuit Court in 1850. Attorney in Anderson County in 1860. Clerk of Anderson Circuit Court in 1863.
